metadata.description: Marketplace making all LimaCharlie plugins available.

plugins.name: lc-query
plugins.description: LimaCharlie Querying Assistant with LCQL query building and historical data analysis

plugins.name: lc-external-datasources
plugins.description: LimaCharlie External Data Sources Assistant for configuring Cloud Sensors, Adapters, and USP integrations with comprehensive telemetry ingestion guidance

plugins.name: lc-org-summary
plugins.description: LimaCharlie Organization Summary Assistant that generates comprehensive summaries of organizations including sensor counts, platform coverage, and configuration details

plugins.name: lc-essentials
plugins.description: Essential LimaCharlie utilities including the lc-doc agent for intelligent documentation search and retrieval from local or remote sources
